name: Cedric Muller
description: Cedric Muller is a member of theRed OcherNomadclan. He, along with many other members of the clan, was used as a subject inBiotechnica'sProject Nightingale. Cedric survived, however he was experiencing excruciating pain in his lungs and soon reached out to aScavengerMaciej Nakonieczny, desperate to get neuroblockers.When meeting, the Scavengers attempted to take Cedric out and harvest his impants.He succumbed tocyberpsychosiswhen they tried to kill him at their meeting spot. Cedric Muller can be encountered in a parking garage inDowntown,City CenterduringCyberpsycho Sighting: On Deaf Ears.
